column2: We are looking for a Graphic Design Professional to join our team       The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in designing and creating graphic components to improve our products     If you are passionate about graphic design, creative conceptualization, and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, come and join us!                Responsibilities                 Conceptualization and Design:       Develop creative and compelling moving and stilt graphic designs for a variety of projects, including but not limited to advertisements, marketing materials, social media content, and event promotions.     Collaborate with the creative team to brainstorm and conceptualize innovative design ideas.       Animation and Motion Graphics:       Create captivating animations and motion graphics for digital platforms, presentations, and events.     Utilize industry-standard software and tools to bring static designs to life through animation.       Stilt Design Expertise:       Specialize in creating graphic designs tailored for stilt performances and events.     Design costumes, props, and promotional materials that enhance the visual appeal of stilt performances.       Technical Proficiency:       Stay updated on the latest design trends, tools, and technologies relevant to moving and stilt graphic design.     Have a solid understanding of software such as Adobe Creative Suite, After Effects, and other animation tools.       Collaboration:       Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, events, and production teams, to ensure that graphic designs align with overall brand messaging and objectives.     Incorporate feedback from team members and stakeholders to refine designs.       Project Management:       Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality designs.     Prioritize and organize workload to meet project deadlines.           Qualifications             Bachelors degree in Graphic Design, Animation, or a related field.     Proven experience in graphic design with a focus on moving and stilt designs.     Strong portfolio showcasing a range of dynamic and innovative design projects.     Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite, After Effects, etc.     Excellent communication and collaboration skills.     Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, creative environment     Experience of 2-3 years and and must have worked with application design segment.

column2: As a graphic design intern, you will have the opportunity to gain practical experience and develop your skills in a professional design environment.      You will work closely with the design team and assist in various design projects, contributing to the creation of visually appealing and impactful materials.          Here is a breakdown of the key responsibilities, tools, and benefits of the internship:      Responsibilities:        Design Projects: Collaborate with the design team to create visually compelling graphics, illustrations, layouts, and other design materials for both print and digital platforms.          Creative Conceptualization: Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute innovative ideas for design projects, considering client requirements, target audience, and brand guidelines.          Visual Branding: Assist in developing and maintaining consistent visual branding across different marketing materials, ensuring adherence to brand guidelines and standards.          Image Editing: Support the team in editing and retouching images, optimizing them for various digital platforms or print materials.          Software Utilization: Utilize industry-standard design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) or other relevant tools to create and manipulate graphics.          Collaborative Feedback: Engage in design critiques and discussions, providing constructive feedback and incorporating feedback from the design team to refine your designs.        Tools:        Adobe Creative Suite: Utilize various software applications within Adobe Creative Suite, such as Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign, for design creation and manipulation.          Design Prototyping Tools: Gain experience with design prototyping tools like Sketch or Figma, which are commonly used to create interactive and user-friendly design mockups.          Online Collaboration Tools: Collaborate with team members using online project management and communication tools such as Asana, Trello, or Slack.        Benefits:        Practical Experience: Gain hands-on experience working on real design projects, applying design principles, and developing your design skills in a professional setting.          Portfolio Development: Build a diverse portfolio of design work that showcases your skills and creativity, which will be invaluable when applying for future graphic design roles.          Mentoring and Guidance: Receive guidance and mentorship from experienced designers who will provide feedback and help you grow as a graphic designer.          Networking Opportunities: Connect with professionals in the design industry, including designers, art directors, and creative professionals, which can open doors for future employment prospects.          Skill Enhancement: Improve your proficiency in design software and tools commonly used in the industry, increasing your marketability as a graphic designer.          Team Collaboration: Experience working as part of a collaborative design team, learning to manage deadlines, prioritize tasks, and communicate effectively with team members.

column2: As a Graphic Concept Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually compelling and innovative design concepts for various marketing, branding, and communication materials. Your role is crucial in shaping the overall look and feel of campaigns, ensuring they align with the organizations brand identity and objectives. Working closely with the creative team and clients, you will develop initial design ideas and see them through to their final implementation.   Responsibilities:      Conceptualization: Collaborate with the creative team and clients to understand project requirements and objectives. Brainstorm and develop original and creative design concepts that effectively communicate the intended message.         Visual Design: Create eye-catching and aesthetically pleasing graphic designs, including but not limited to advertisements, social media graphics, brochures, packaging, posters, and web graphics.         Branding and Identity: Ensure that all designs adhere to the organizations brand guidelines, maintaining brand consistency across various platforms and materials.         Trend Research: Stay updated with design trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies to infuse fresh ideas into your work and keep designs contemporary.         Presentations: Effectively present design concepts to clients or internal stakeholders, explaining the rationale behind the choices and incorporating feedback to refine designs.         Collaboration: Collaborate with copywriters, illustrators, photographers, and other team members to integrate various elements into cohesive design projects.         Project Management: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality design assets.         Feedback and Iteration: Be open to feedback from clients, creative directors, or team members, and be willing to iterate and refine designs based on input.         File Management: Organize and maintain design files, ensuring they are accessible and well-structured for future reference and collaboration.     Qualifications and Skills:      Bachelors degree or diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field.         Proven experience (X years) as a Graphic Designer, Concept Designer, or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing a variety of creative design concepts.         Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign) and other relevant tools.         Strong understanding of design principles, composition, typography, color theory, and visual hierarchy.         Creative flair and the ability to think conceptually to develop unique design ideas.         Excellent communication skills to effectively present and explain design concepts to stakeholders.         Attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and consistency in design deliverables.         Ability to work both independently and collaboratively as part of a team.         Time management skills to meet deadlines and handle multiple projects simultaneously.         Knowledge of web design principles and responsive design is a plus.

Client Collaboration: Work closely with clients to understand their design needs for illuminated signs, offer creative solutions, and effectively communicate design concepts and progress.         3. Team Leadership: Mentor and guide junior designers, providing feedback and helping them develop their skills in both graphic design and illuminated signage.         4. Quality Control: Review and approve final design materials, ensuring they meet brand standards and client requirements, including those specific to illuminated signs.         7. This role is ideal for someone who not only has a strong background in both graphic design and video editing but also embodies a deep artistic sensibility and a keen eye for visual storytelling. Job   Summary: In this position, you will create compelling visual content that communicates our brand's message across various platforms, enhancing our digital and physical presence. You will be responsible for delivering innovative designs and engaging video content that resonates with our audience and supports our marketing strategies. Key   Responsibilities: ??Develop high-impact graphics and illustrations for marketing materials and digital campaigns. ??Edit and produce videos for social media, ensuring they align with our narrative and meet engagement goals. ??Create visual content optimized for SEO and various digital platforms, understanding the specifics of each channel. ??Engage in creative problem-solving to address design challenges and provide innovative solutions. ??Manage multiple projects from concept through completion under tight deadlines. Key   Qualifications: ??A minimum of 2 years' experience in graphic design and video editing, with a robust portfolio showcasing a wide range of skills. ??Expertise in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), CorelDraw,  Adobe Premiere Pro, Filmora, and other relevant design and editing tools. ??Advanced skills in typography, layout, and color theory, with a good understanding of  digital and print media requirements. ??Excellent project management abilities, capable of leading projects independently and collaborating with teams. ??Strong communication skills, capable of presenting concepts and leading creative discussions. ??Experience with digital marketing, branding, and producing visually appealing content tailored for social media. ??Knowledge of the latest industry trends, technologies, and design tools, with a willingness to continually learn and adapt. ??Understanding of cultural nuances in design, aiming to create universally appealing content. What   We   Offer:   ??An opportunity to work in a creative and collaborative environment that values innovation and creativity. ??Competitive salary and opportunities for professional development and growth. ??The chance to work on diverse projects that challenge and expand your skills. column2: Design has played an integral in the success of all our marketing efforts at Plum.               Every campaign led by our marketing team - our reports, our playbooks, our campaigns, and even our games - has its own unique sub-brand. This not only helps us with recall but also lets us expand, experiment, and build our existing visual brand.               Every piece of social media content that people have come to associate with and love about Plum - our album art, sending a Plum to space, Rupi Kaur poems, and our customer announcements - has a visual quality that s designed to delight.                We like working with and hanging out with designers more than the others in the team.                Our marketing isn t about being traditional, safe, or boring. And for our aspirations to translate into outcomes, we need someone who can complement our ideas with a compelling visual brand.                Because pictures speak a thousand words.                      What you will work on ?               Tl,dr: entertaining things that you d be proud to put on your portfolio.              As a Graphic Design Intern within our dynamic Marketing Team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping visual content for our brand. column2: Design has played an integral in the success of all our marketing efforts at Plum.               Every campaign led by our marketing team - our reports, our playbooks, our campaigns, and even our games - has its own unique sub-brand. This not only helps us with recall but also lets us expand, experiment, and build our existing visual brand.               Every piece of social media content that people have come to associate with and love about Plum - our album art, sending a Plum to space, Rupi Kaur poems, and our customer announcements - has a visual quality that s designed to delight.                We like working with and hanging out with designers more than the others in the team.                Our marketing isn t about being traditional, safe, or boring. And for our aspirations to translate into outcomes, we need someone who can complement our ideas with a compelling visual brand.                Because pictures speak a thousand words.                      What you will work on ?               The entertaining things that you d be proud to put on your portfolio. column2: A Graphic Designer is a professional who creates visual concepts and designs for various mediums to communicate messages or ideas effectively     They combine artistic skills, creativity, and technical proficiency to develop visually appealing designs     Here are some key responsibilities of a Graphic Designer:Concept Development: Graphic Designers collaborate with clients or creative teams to understand their requirements and develop design concepts     They brainstorm ideas, research visual trends, and create design mockups or sketches that align with the project objectives     Visual Design: Graphic Designers use various design elements, such as color, typography, images, and layout, to create visually engaging designs     They design graphics for print materials, digital platforms, websites, social media, logos, packaging, and other marketing or promotional materials     Branding and Identity: Graphic Designers play a crucial role in developing and maintaining brand identity     They create brand guidelines, including logo design, color palettes, typography, and visual style guides, to ensure consistency across all brand materials     Layout and Composition: Graphic Designers determine the arrangement and placement of design elements within a layout     They consider factors such as balance, hierarchy, proportion, and visual flow to create visually appealing and user-friendly designs     Digital Design: In the digital space, Graphic Designers create designs optimized for various digital platforms, such as websites, mobile applications, social media platforms, and email campaigns     They ensure the designs are responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing across different devices and screen sizes     Image Editing and Manipulation: Graphic Designers are skilled in image editing and manipulation using software such as Adobe Photoshop     They retouch and enhance images, adjust colors, remove backgrounds, and resize images to fit design requirements

column2: Role Overview: We are seeking a skilled and creative Graphic Designer with 4-6 years of experience to join our team. The Graphic Designer will be responsible for producing high-quality designs that effectively communicate our brand's message across various platforms. The ideal candidate should possess a sound knowledge of print and artworks, demonstrate expertise in core design software, and have a keen eye for detail. Adherence to brand guidelines, timely delivery of artworks, and the ability to work with speed and efficiency are essential for success in this role. Key Responsibilities:  Create visually appealing and engaging designs for print and digital media, including packaging designs, brochures, flyers, social media graphics, website banners, and email campaigns.  Adhere to brand guidelines and ensure consistency in design elements, including color palettes, typography, and style.  Demonstrate proficiency in design software such as Corel Draw, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Illustrator to execute high-quality artworks.  Collaborate with the marketing and creative teams to understand project requirements, objectives, and target audience.  Demonstrate speed and efficiency in executing print artworks while maintaining a high level of quality.  Adapt designs for different platforms and mediums, ensuring optimal visual impact and usability.  Incorporate feedback from team members and stakeholders, making necessary revisions to achieve the desired outcome.  Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver artworks within specified timelines.  Stay updated on design trends, emerging technologies, and industry best practices to enhance design capabilities.  Assist with photo retouching, resizing, and optimization for various platforms as required.  Maintain organized file management and ensure proper archiving of design assets. Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree or equivalent in graphic design or a related field.  2-3 years of experience as a Graphic Designer, preferably in a fast-paced environment.  Proficient in design software such as Corel Draw, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Illustrator.  Strong knowledge of print production processes and artwork preparation.  Demonstrated ability to adhere to brand guidelines and maintain consistency in design elements.  Excellent attention to detail, with a focus on accuracy and precision.  Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to meet deadlines.  Effective communication and collaboration skills to work within a team. A strong portfolio showcasing a range of design work, including print and digital projects. Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Job Description: we are seeking a talented and creative Design and Photography Executive to join our team in New Delhi. The ideal candidate will have a passion for design and photography, with experience in product photography and graphic designing for various ecommerce platforms such as Flipkart, Amazon; and social media. Responsibilities: Product Photography:  Capture high-quality images of our products for use in ecommerce listings, marketing materials, and social media platforms. Design Creation:  Create engaging and visually appealing designs for product packaging, promotional materials, digital advertisements, and website content. Ecommerce Optimization:  Ensure that all product images and designs meet the requirements and guidelines of each ecommerce platform to maximize visibility and conversion rates. Creative Collaboration:  Work closely with the marketing and ecommerce teams to develop creative concepts and strategies that effectively showcase our products and brand identity. Image Editing:  Edit and retouch product images to enhance their appearance and highlight key features, ensuring consistency and quality across all platforms. Content Development:  Assist in the creation of compelling product descriptions, taglines, and other content to accompany images and enhance the overall shopping experience. Brand Consistency:  Maintain brand consistency and integrity across all visual assets, ensuring that our brand identity is accurately represented in all communications. Market Research:  Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in design and photography for ecommerce, and incorporate new ideas and techniques into our creative process. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Photography, Fine Arts, or related field. 2+ years of experience in product photography and graphic design, preferably in the ecommerce or retail industry. Proficiency in photography techniques, including lighting, composition, and editing. Strong portfolio showcasing experience in product photography and graphic design for ecommerce platforms. Expertise in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other design software such as Corel Draw Knowledge of ecommerce platforms such as Flipkart, Amazon, Myntra, Snapdeal, etc., and their image requirements and guidelines. Excellent creative thinking and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively convey ideas and concepts to diverse stakeholders. Passion for design, photography, and ecommerce, with a drive to continuously improve and innovate.

column1: Graphic Designer Executive || Brevistay Hospitality Pvt Ltd
column2: Role Overview:  As a Graphic Designer at Brevistay, you'll work closely with cross-functional teams to  create visually compelling assets that resonate with our audience. You'll have the  opportunity to contribute to a wide range of projects, from digital marketing campaigns  and website design to brand activations and print collateral. We're looking for a talented  and versatile designer who is passionate about storytelling, user experience, and driving  engagement through exceptional design.  Key Responsibilities:   -  Brand Identity : Develop and maintain Brevistay's brand visual identity across all  touchpoints, ensuring consistency and adherence to brand guidelines.  Digital Marketing Assets : Create eye-catching visuals for online marketing campaigns,  including banner ads, social media graphics, email templates, and landing pages.  Website Design:  Collaborate with UX/UI designers to design and optimize the user  experience of Brevistay's website, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing interface.  Content Creation:  Conceptualize and design multimedia content, including infographics,  videos, animations, and interactive experiences, to support content marketing initiatives. Print Materials : Design print collateral such as brochures, flyers, posters, and event  signage, maintaining brand consistency across all printed materials.  Illustration & Iconography:  Create custom illustrations and icons to enhance visual  storytelling and communication across various marketing channels and platforms. M Motion Graphics:  Produce animated visual content for digital ads, social media posts, and  website features, adding movement and engagement to static graphics (not mandatory but  definitely a plus).  Collaboration:  Work closely with marketing managers, content creators, copywriters, and  other stakeholders to bring creative concepts to life and meet project objectives.  Feedback & Iteration:  Solicit feedback from team members and stakeholders, incorporate  revisions and iterate on designs to achieve the desired outcome.  Stay Current:  Stay up-to-date with design trends, industry best practices, and emerging  technologies to continually improve the quality and effectiveness of Brevistay's visual  assets.  Qualifications:  Bachelor's/Master's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or related  field.   Experience:  1+ years of experience in graphic design, preferably in a digital marketing or  branding role (freelancers can also apply).   Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects) and other  relevant design tools.   Strong portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design projects and styles.   Excellent understanding of typography, color theory, layout, and composition.   Solid understanding of user experience principles and best practices.   Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively in a cross functional team environment.   Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast paced, dynamic environment.   Passion for travel, hospitality, and storytelling is a plus.  Why Brevistay :  Joining Brevistay means being part of a community that is reimagining the way people  travel. You'll have the opportunity to work on meaningful projects that have a positive  impact on millions of travelers across India and beyond. Our culture values creativity,  collaboration, and diversity, and we're committed to fostering an inclusive and supportive  work environment where everyone can thrive and bring their authentic selves to work. If you're passionate about design and looking for a role where you can make a difference,  we'd love to hear from you. Come be a part of our journey to create a world where anyone  can belong anywhere

Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. column2: Skill required:Sales and Solution Enablement - Graphic & Visual Design  Designation:Graphic & Visual Design Associate  Job Location:Gurugram  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:1 to 3 years  What would you do? You Are: A visual storyteller with a keen eye for detail. Your approach to work mixes imagination with discipline. This allows you to think outside of the box, while working within brand guidelines. A creative collaborator with the ability to adapt to feedback, you thrive in a fast-paced environment.  What are we looking for? Here's what you need:  Minimum of 2 years' experience in document and presentation design working in Microsoft Word and PowerPoint on PC platform  Minimum of 1 year professional experience in any of these Adobe apps:Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Acrobat  Completion of provided Graphic Design skills assessment  Advanced command of the English language [other language requirements per MU specification/needs] Extra credit if you have:  Portfolio with relevant work examples  Experience with proposal response development  Bachelors degree, preferably in Graphic Design or related discipline You May Also Need:  A home office or work area that is suitable for productive remote work, per local guidelines. This includes a safe, ergonomic workspace and a high-speed internet connection that is stable and secure. Roles and Responsibilities The Work: The Pursuit Services Graphic Design team creates engaging visual concepts and supporting graphics to highlight key sales messages and emphasize win themes in a variety of pursuit deliverables. As part of a team of designers, you help develop creative concepts that resonate with Accenture's clients. You work primarily in Word and PowerPoint to create and format proposal documents that conform to client requirements and Accenture brand guidelines. You translate complex data into compelling infographics. Primary responsibilities include:  Incorporate design principles of composition, color, typography to create engaging print and digital deliverables  Utilize page layout design and consistent formatting to comply with client-specific requirements  Follow graphics workflow process, using appropriate templates, tools, and repositories  Use suitable stock imagery, illustrations, and design elements to complement visual concepts  Assist with final production tasks, including preparing files for printing and/or online submission  Organize and archive graphic design assets for individual assignments  Demonstrate an intermediate level in:MS Word, PPT; Acrobat Pro

As a graphic designer, you will collaborate closely with our product development and creative teams to develop visually appealing and effective designs across various platforms. column2: We are seeking a talented and experienced visual and graphics design associate to join our dynamic design team.      This position will play a key role in creating visually compelling and engaging designs that align with our brand identity and communications objectives.      The role requires a creative mindset, strong attention to detail, and a passion for producing high-quality visual content.                Activities and Tasks        Responsibilities will include, but not be limited to, the following:        Graphic Design: Creating and designing visual content for a variety of digital and print media, including but not limited to books, reports, infographics, social media graphics, event collateral, presentations, and advertisements;      Brand Consistency: Ensuring that all design work aligns with IIHS brand guidelines and maintaining a consistent visual identity across all channels;      Collaboration: Collaborating closely with the design team, marketing team, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver on design briefs;      Concept Development: Participating in brainstorming sessions and contributing innovative design ideas that drive engagement and resonate with the target audience;      Visual Assets Management: Maintaining a well-organised library of visual assets, including images, icons, and templates for easy access and utilisation by the team;      Design Software Proficiency: Utilizing industry-standard design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite) to create and edit graphics, illustrations, and other visual content;      Quality Assurance: Conducting thorough reviews, including proofreading, to ensure that all design work meets quality standards and is error-free;      Deadline Management: Managing multiple design projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines, and communicating effectively with team members about project status;      Trends and Innovation: Staying up-to-date with design trends, emerging technologies, and best practices to continually enhance design skills and creativity;      Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others;      Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and travelling on IIHS work within the country as and when needed.              Structure and Reporting        The associate will be an External Consultant coordinating with the Head - Communications and Design at IIHS or with any other person designated by the Head, and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and where needed, external individuals/organizations, and students.                Person Specification      The ideal candidate should have:        A Design/ Art school background with a Graduate or Post Graduate degree in Graphic design, Visual Communication or a related discipline;      Proven experience in graphic design, with 4-6 years of relevant work experience and the ability to work independently;      A strong portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design projects and a keen eye for aesthetics;      Proficiency in industry-standard design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign);      Excellent understanding of typography, color theory, and layout principles;      Strong attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality design work;      Good language proficiency in English, Kannada or Hindi; effective communication and collaboration skills; excellent inter-personal skills and the ability to work with inter-disciplinary teams;      Strong time management skills and the ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment;      Knowledge of web design principles and UI/UX design concepts; this would be a plus;      Added advantage: Photography, Drawing/Sketching, Animation, Knowledge of HTML, Web-programming, WordPress or any CMS based web applications and Hosting sites on FTP.

column2: This position will support marketing efforts in the AMETEK PTMC Business Unit, which includes Precitech, Sterling and TMC. At PTMC, we see graphic design as visual storytelling that engages, informs, and inspires. We are looking for a highly creative graphic designer who can take conceptual ideas and create visual representations, both in print and electronic media. Our ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of current design software and skilled with every step of the design process from concept to the final deliverable. Collaborating with multiple teams at our company, the graphic designer should be able to take direction from written or spoken ideas and convert them into a design that connects. The successful candidate will have a thorough understanding of branding and marketing, with the ability to vary style and layouts depending on the project.                                              Objectives of this Role                                       Work on a wide range of projects and media, using various computer software, such as the Adobe Creative Suite, to visualize and develop innovative graphic designs that meet business goals                                 Obtain input from management, ensuring designs meet organizational standards and brand expectations, express ideas accurately, and represent the company appropriately                                 Work independently and cooperatively on multiple projects with marketing team, meeting deadlines and budget constraints, and scheduling project implementation based on workload, which will include numerous simultaneous projects                                 Work with the marketing team to modernize our design logos, templates, website and other materials.                                 Update and maintain internal databases of designs, photography, and video                                       Daily and Monthly Responsibilities                                       Collaborate, brainstorm, and strategize with the sales and marketing teams for a wide range of materials that may include web pages, presentations, marketing collateral, signage, internal communication, newsletters, trade show graphics, price lists, videos, social media posts, and email.                                 Translate strategic direction into high-quality design within an established brand identity. Enhance our brand identity by incorporating more modern branding practices                                 Develop concepts and execute original content determining ideal usage of color, text, font style, imagery, and layout                                 Manage the design and uploading process of all project material, understanding best practices for using a content management system                                       Skills and Qualifications                                       Bachelor s degree in graphic design, art, or similar discipline                                 Exceptional creativity and innovative design skills                                 Experience (academic and professional) with design software, including Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop, and Acrobat                                 Proven experience with graphic design, with a strong portfolio of work                                 Excellent communication and presentation skills                                 Organizational and time-management skills for meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment                                       Preferred Qualifications                                       3+ years in professional graphic design                                 Photography and video experience and proficiency with photo-editing and video-editing software such as Adobe After Effects.                                 Experience with BigCommerce or other eCommerce systems

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Graphic Designer with 5-7 years of experience in the field, particularly in B2C environments within industries such as Travel Tech, Food Tech, Ecommerce, or related fields. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of delivering visually compelling designs that resonate with target audiences. Responsibilities: Develop innovative and engaging visual concepts, graphics, and layouts for various digital and print materials, including but not limited to websites, social media assets, marketing campaigns, packaging, and promotional materials. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, product development, and content creators, to understand project objectives and deliver design solutions that align with brand guidelines and strategic objectives. Create and maintain brand identities, ensuring consistency across all visual elements and touchpoints. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, design tools, and best practices to continuously enhance design quality and effectiveness. Manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks effectively, and meet deadlines while maintaining high-quality standards. Provide guidance and mentorship to junior members of the design team, fostering creativity and professional growth. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, Motion graphics or related field. 5-7 years of professional experience as a graphic designer, with a strong portfolio demonstrating a diverse range of design projects and styles. Experience working in B2C environments, preferably within Travel Tech, Food Tech, Ecommerce, or related industries. Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and familiarity with design tools like Sketch, Figma, or Adobe XD. Solid understanding of branding principles, typography, color theory, and layout design. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively articulate and present design concepts to stakeholders. Strong attention to detail, creativity, and problem-solving skills. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing priorities. Previous experience in UX/UI design and knowledge of HTML, CSS, and responsive design principles is a plus. Passion for design and a proactive attitude towards learning and professional development. Preferred: Certification or specialized training in graphic design or related field. Previous experience in IT or familiarity with tech-related products and services

column2: The company was founded with a heartfelt intention to provide top-quality, affordable baby essentials in the market. Recognizing a gap in the availability of such products, the founders embarked on a journey to offer practical and aesthetically pleasing designs to make parenting easier. From bibs to strollers to fashionable clothing, the company strives to cater to all aspects of parenthood, ensuring that parents can navigate this transformative journey with ease. We are seeking a creative and talented Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will create visually appealing and on-brand graphics for various platforms, including digital and print media and Product Packaging. The Graphic Designer will collaborate with the marketing and communication teams to bring concepts to life and ensure a consistent visual identity.  Responsibilities:  Conceptualize and Design: Create visually engaging and innovative graphics for digital and print materials, including websites, social media, brochures, posters and advertisements.  Brand Consistency: Ensure all design elements adhere to brand guidelines and maintain a cohesive visual identity across all platforms.  Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, communication, and product teams, to understand project requirements and objectives.  Creative Input: Provide creative input and ideas during brainstorming sessions, contributing to the overall development of marketing campaigns and materials.  Software Proficiency: Demonstrate proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects, Premier Pro) and other relevant tools.  Deadline Management: Manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver high-quality work within specified timelines.  Feedback Incorporation: Receive feedback from team members and stakeholders and incorporate changes to improve designs.  Stay Updated: Keep abreast of industry trends, design best practices, and emerging technologies to continually enhance skills and stay relevant.  Qualifications:  Education: Bachelor's degree in graphic design, Fine Arts, or related field.  Experience: Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design projects.  Technical Skills: Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite and other relevant design software.  Creativity: Strong creative and conceptual thinking abilities, with an eye for detail and design aesthetics.  Communication: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate and present design concepts.  Adaptability: Ability to adapt to evolving design trends and technologies.  Team Player: Collaborative mindset with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.  Time Management: Strong organizational and time-management skills to handle multiple projects simultaneously.

We expect you to come up with creative solutions and consider many alternative solutions to each problem. column2: Job Description       At ASR, we see graphic design as visual storytelling that engages, informs, and inspires. We are looking for a highly creative graphic designer who can take conceptual ideas and create visual representations, both in print and electronic media. Our ideal candidate should have expert knowledge of current design software and skilled with every step of the design process from concept to the final deliverable. Collaborating with multiple teams at our company, the graphic designer should be able to take direction from written or spoken ideas and convert them into a design that connects. Use trend intelligence and an understanding of the current and historical business and market to design and execute specific classifications.         Overseeing all design projects, from conception to delivery (which includes print file). column2: An illustrator is a creative professional who uses their artistic skills to visually communicate ideas, concepts, or stories through various mediums     Their primary role is to create visual representations that enhance and complement written or verbal content     The job description of an illustrator can vary depending on the industry and specific requirements, but here are some common responsibilities and skills associated with the role:Visual Conceptualization: Illustrators are responsible for interpreting written or verbal descriptions and developing visual concepts that effectively convey the intended message     They often collaborate with clients or creative teams to understand project objectives and create appropriate visual solutions     Artistic Skills: Illustrators possess strong artistic and technical skills     They have a deep understanding of composition, color theory, perspective, and drawing techniques     They can create artwork using traditional media (such as pencils, pens, paints) or digital tools (such as illustration software or graphic tablets)     Storytelling and Narrative: Illustrators often work on projects that require them to tell stories visually     They can create characters, scenes, or sequential illustrations that engage the audience and communicate complex ideas or emotions effectively     Research and Reference Gathering: Illustrators may need to conduct research and gather visual references to ensure accuracy and authenticity in their illustrations     This may involve studying historical periods, cultures, or specific subjects to create detailed and realistic artwork     Collaboration: Illustrators frequently collaborate with clients, writers, designers, or art directors to understand project requirements and make necessary revisions

column2: The role of a Graphic Designer is to create visual concepts that communicate ideas, inspire and inform the target audience.      ?       Here are some of the key roles and responsibilities of a Graphic Designer:           Conceptualise Design Ideas:    Graphic designers are responsible for brainstorming and creating innovative and visually appealing design concepts for various projects, including but not limited to advertisements, websites, logos, brochures, and packaging.       Develop Design Solutions:    Graphic designers create designs that effectively communicate messages and brand identities through visual elements, such as colour, typography, and layout.       Collaborate with Clients or Team Members:    Graphic Designers work with clients or other team members to determine project goals and requirements and incorporate feedback into their designs.       Create and Deliver Designs:    Graphic Designers create and deliver final design files for print, digital, or other mediums, ensuring the final product meets quality standards and specifications.       Keep Up with Industry Trends:    Graphic Designers should stay up-to-date with      industry trends, techniques, and software advancements, continually improving their skills and staying competitive in the marketplace.       Manage Project Timelines and Budgets:    Graphic Designers manage project timelines and budgets, ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget.       Prepare and Present Design Proposals:    Graphic designers must prepare and present design proposals to clients or stakeholders, showcasing their design concepts and explaining how their solutions meet project goals.     Overall, a Graphic Designer is responsible for creating innovative design solutions that effectively communicate messages and brand identities. They collaborate with clients and team members, deliver high-quality designs, stay up-to-date with industry trends and manage project timelines and budgets.         Requirements         Proven Graphic Designing experience.         A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphics.         Familiarity with design software (such as Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign)         A keen eye for aesthetics and details.         Excellent communication skills.         Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines.         A degree in Design, Fine Arts or a related field is a bonus.         Proven Work Experience with Social Media (preferably 0-6 Months)

column2: About Info Edge:   We are Info Edge, a pioneer in the Indian internet ecosystem.  We help people connect  We help people navigate through important decisions in their life. You may have heard about  us when you are looking for a job (Naukri), a house (99acres), a life partner (Jeevansathi), or  while you were studying (Shiksha). We help users decide the right college, identify dream  opportunities, find a life partner, a new place. Here are some brands you'll be working with.  We invest in ideas with potential:   We also invest actively (more than 30+ brands), and you might recognize us if you order  food online (Zomato) or buy insurance online (Policy bazaar). There are also others like  Happily Unmarried, DoSelect, etc.  We are re-inventing:   As technology is transforming and there are newer & faster ways to solve the old problems  at hand, we're transitioning from classifieds to a more AI-driven value provider. We are  embarking on a transformation journey from transactional-driven product experiences to  value-driven personal experiences by incorporating emerging tech stack, data science, and  machine learning into our products.  In short, we constantly strive to run sustainable businesses in the consumer internet space  in India (with a proven track record). We are close to $8 billion+ in market cap but are a lot  more in how we touch everyone's life on a day-to-day basis. And we aspire to do more.  We believe in inclusion:   The team is a mix of 40+ passionate designers from all over India, including Kerala, Bhopal,  Pune, Jharkhand, Delhi, NCR, Ahmedabad, Chennai, Mumbai, Bengaluru and more! Where  some designers come from reputed design institutes like IIT, NIFT, NID, Symbiosis, others  are self-taught designers driven by passion. Moreover, we have members with varied  experience in the industry. We not only see many freshers coming on board, but also have  designers with over 15+ years of experience in the field! Apart from work, it is also  interesting to learn how everyone comes with various hobbies. We share some of these in  our Friday sessions - singing, playing, painting, swimming, dancing, calligraphy, etc. and  were sure youd love to be part of these!  Job description:   Visual storytelling has been a proven working mechanism in making the brand & consumer  relationship stronger. With strong visual narratives, we expect to grab our user's attention to convey our brand values, and our care towards users and thus enjoy that competitive edge over others. And, hence YOU...  You should come with:   An understanding of the latest communication trends and their role within a consumer  environment  High confidence on production software's like Adobe, Figma, etc.  Basic understanding about UX/UI  Basic understanding of product development life cycle from idea to post-production/go-live  A portfolio that demonstrates good understanding of elements that constitutes towards well-  balanced designs (typography, color, typeface selection, strokes, illustration styles, layout, hierarchy, balance, etc.)  High sense of ownership towards your deliverables  An eye towards accuracy and attention to detail  A portfolio that not only demonstrates idea execution but also idea generation & how you took  them forward  You are expected to:   Understand & follow the brand guidelines closely  Understand the users & their accepted styles of communication  Partner in the ideation process for different campaigns  Ensure that the brief and the ideation process translate into execution excellence  Ensure that all output is brand consistent and of high quality  Contribute towards improving the overall visual appeal of all brand assets  Work on consumer brands with strong digital narratives  Ability to switch context & be able to work with cross-functional teams  Ensure adherence to delivery timelines for all output  Understand stakeholder requirements & come up with visual story narratives to connect brand  & consumers  Coordinate with social media managers & team managers for monthly content ideas and  briefs  Develop concepts, graphics and layouts for multiple channels.  Have a scalable approach in your outputs (how same content can suit different channels)  Achieve targets that increase brand awareness and customer engagement  Present ideas to stakeholders as well as leadership  Do multi-task whenever needed & meet all established deadlines  Take complex data and present it in a clear, digestible way to users  Maintain & evolve the visual branding assets  What truly matters to us:   Passion to learn more  Asking the right question  Collaborating at all levels  Motivating each other  Mutual respect  Taking ownership  Managing stakeholders  Tracking success metrics  If this is something that excites you, we??l love to have you on board! :)

column2: The Graphic Designer is responsible for creating visual concepts, graphics, and layouts to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, or captivate consumers. They develop the overall layout and production design for various applications, such as advertisements, brochures, magazines, corporate reports, and websites. This role requires creativity, technical proficiency in design software, attention to detail, and the ability to translate ideas into visually appealing designs.             Key Responsibilities:         Develop visual concepts and graphics for various projects, including print and digital materials, to effectively communicate the desired message and brand identity.     Create and design marketing materials, such as brochures, flyers, posters, banners, logos, and social media graphics, adhering to brand guidelines and design standards.     Collaborate with the marketing team, clients, or project managers to understand design requirements, objectives, and target audience preferences.     Use design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign), to create original artwork and layouts for print and digital media.     Select colors, images, typography, and other design elements to enhance visual appeal and convey the intended message effectively.     Incorporate feedback and revisions into designs to ensure client satisfaction and alignment with project goals.     Stay updated on industry trends, design techniques, and emerging technologies to maintain a competitive edge and enhance skills.     Manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks to meet deadlines and project milestones.     Prepare final artwork for production, ensuring accurate specifications, dimensions, and file formats for printing or digital publishing.     Maintain organized files and archives of design assets, ensuring easy access and retrieval for future projects.               Qualifications:         Bachelors degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field (preferred).     Proven experience as a graphic designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing creative and high-quality design work.     Proficiency in graphic design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign), and other relevant tools.     Strong understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout techniques.     Creative thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate concepts into visually appealing designs.     Attention to detail and accuracy in artwork production, ensuring consistency and adherence to brand guidelines.     Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.     Time management and organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.     Familiarity with web design principles, UX/UI concepts, and multimedia design is a plus.     Experience with motion graphics, animation, or video editing is advantageous but not required.

Experience with design patterns, tackling complex technical challenges and providing innovative solutions.         Experience with definition and development of server-side APIs understands what it takes to build and support large-scale production microservices         Ability to adapt quickly to a rapidly changing environment and new technologies.         You love working out the underpinnings of novel software and product offerings and being the face of delivery     What You ll Do:      Work closely with UI/UX engineering to realize the intended user experience.         Work closely with backend engineers to design and implement well-architected, reusable code for Microservices and technology integrations.         Build reusable common components/libraries for authentication, logging, monitoring, metering for future use         Ensure applications meet the highest of expectations across performance, latency, scalability and compliance         Document product to ensure coworkers and customers can maximize its value         Identify and troubleshoot issues, optimize performance, and enhance the user experience     Years of experience:      10+ years of experience in software development with a focus on Mobile & backend development         Strong experience in React Native, React, Java, Spring Boot, Spring Framework, restful APIs and system architecture         Experience in defining APIs as Swagger specification, choosing 3rd party software products, technology frameworks and defining the integration patterns         Experience in owning the end-to-end technology delivery and hands-on trouble shooting.         Experience developing POC s with new technologies on front end mobile or backend.         Expertise in building reusable technical components for accelerating delivery.         Experience in all layers of technology stack, containerization, deployment, mobile app rolls out and security.         Solid Experience in working with NoSQL databases preferably MongoDB         Proficiency with RESTful API design and development, Integration patterns with OATH, Chat, Streaming, Payments and CMS.         Experience with Elastic stack, Grafana for logging & monitoring. column2: As a Senior Graphic Designer, you'll be responsible for contributing to, maintaining, and shaping the future of the visual      brand on our web properties.          One of the most challenging and rewarding parts of this role is designing elegant and easily      digestible solutions to convey highly complex and abstract ideas.          You'll work collaboratively with other designers,      developers, and other members of the marketing team                  Skills Required:                  3+ years of design/visualisation experience at a design/ digital/ marketing/ advertisement agency              Intermediate-level experience in Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects              Video/animation experience is a must              Self-starter who can execute on ideas, manage and prioritise multiple design tasks              You consider yourself a wearer of many hats, with the ability to take an idea from concept to sketches to high      -      fidelity designs, and finally seeing it through with web developers to make sure your designs are 100% pixel      -      perfect.                  How does your day 1 look like              You will be completing your HR formalities              Onboarding with the company know-how              You would be introduced to your new friends who you can choose to call your colleagues, acquaintance or best      buddies                  How does your first month look like              Understand company design guidelines and start giving your experience spin-off to our current set of designs      language                  How do your first 3 months look like              You would have recreated our design language by now              Brain-stormed & executed award-worthy campaigns              Reduced TATs by 50% of producing designs                  How do your first 6 months look like              Your designs have started converting into website traffic/sign ups              You have become a master SAAS creative visualiser              Your established design language has started winning awards & recognition across the industry              Your designs are shared by thousands of people on the internet

column1: Graphic & Visual Design Specialist - Creative Services
column2: Skill required:Creative Services - Creative production and Graphics  Designation:Management Level - Team Lead/Consultant  Job Location:Mumbai  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:7 to 11 years  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We're looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. The visual design and development team is responsible for designing and planning the implementation of visual materials such as illustrations, photography, typography, space, layouts, and color. Visualizing and creating graphics including illustrations, logos, layouts and photos; shaping the visual aspects of websites, books, magazines, product packaging, exhibitions and more by using Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator, Corel draw.  What are we looking for? Collaboration and interpersonal skills  Ability to perform under pressure  Problem-solving skills  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Process-orientation Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of moderately complex problems  May create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures  The person would require understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals  Primary upward interaction is with direct supervisor  May interact with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture  Guidance would be provided when determining methods and procedures on new assignments  Decisions made by you will often impact the team in which they reside  Individual would manage small teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts
